column4: anyone got any guesses how long it'll take to install feisty on a 400mhz amd-k6 w/ 64mb ram?
Free pizza to the closest guess?
lol mb we could work out something
What speed CD ROM?
Fresh install?
yep
35 minutes
my parents were thinking of throwing it out so i thought i'd play with ubuntu over the summer instead
OK, maybe closer to 45 minutes
i've already gotten a few "out of memory" msgs
He he.  oops
so i'm not sure what to do about those
Try xubuntu using the alternate cd image.
It's better suited for older hardware with limited memory.  How much RAM do you have?
64MB
it's an old Gateway Profile (1st gen) so it's near impossible to upgrade
Don't even try Ubuntu.  Grab Xubuntu and make sure you grab the alternate image.
whats with the alternate image?
http://cdimages.ubuntu.com/xubuntu/releases/feisty/release/  scroll down to the Alternate install CD
Xubuntu is much better suited for old hardware with limited memory
big thanks for the recommendation. def sounds like waht i need
